channel.title: ansible on Turing Machines Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in ansible on Turing Machines Documentation

item.title: OS Installation on Turing Master
item.description: This page describes simple steps to install the OS (HypriotOS) on the PIs.

item.title: OS Installation on Turing Worker
item.description: This page describes simple steps to install the OS (HypriotOS) on the PIs.

item.title: Using Ansible to manage Turing Pi
item.description: Even if the ultimate goal is to manage completly the cluster using Kubernetes, the ability to use Ansible during debug process is very usefull. The goal here is to setup ansible inventory, basic playbooks.
